name: To the deep (RVenson)
description:
Your mission is to rescue a ship that has crashed inside a crater on a very, very distant planet. Inspired by classics like Lunar Lander, Crazy Gravity and Donkey Kong 3.

The main mechanic is to rotate your ship and accelerate. But be careful, you have a limited amount of gas and any touch will cause the ship to crash.

Commands

* A and D - Rotate the ship

* Space - Acelerate

* ESC - Restart on the last checkpoint
